pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sender------Sender is easy``````````````.. code:: python from sender import Mail mail = Mail() mail.send_message("Hello", fromaddr="from@example.com", to="to@example.com", body="Hello world!")Install```````.. code:: bash $ pip install senderLinks`````* `documentation <http://sender.readthedocs.org/>`_* `github <https://github.com/fengsp/sender>`_* `development version <http://github.com/fengsp/sender/zipball/master#egg=sender-dev>`_
